title: What happens when you rub rocks together? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends entirely on the rocks and how hard you rub them together. Some soft rocks, like talc, will powder. Some hard rocks would chip if enough force were applied. Other rocks, like flint, can make sparks. All should heat up, as a result of friction.
Not much. one might scratch the other. If you do it long enough, one might cause noticable wear on the other. Most people have better things to do with their time, fortunately.
